thread.title: BRIEF-Babcock & Wilcox Enterprises Says Co Entered Into Amendment No. 6 To Credit Agreement, Which Amended Credit Agreement, Dated May 11, 2015

title: BRIEF-Babcock & Wilcox Enterprises Says Co Entered Into Amendment No. 6 To Credit Agreement, Which Amended Credit Agreement, Dated May 11, 2015
text:
April 11 (Reuters) - Babcock & Wilcox Enterprises Inc :
* ON APRIL 10, CO ENTERED INTO AMENDMENT NO. 6 TO CREDIT AGREEMENT, WHICH AMENDED CREDIT AGREEMENT, DATED MAY 11, 2015
* AMENDMENT TO MODIFY DEFINITION OF EBITDA IN CREDIT AGREEMENT TO EXCLUDE UP TO $51.1 MILLION OF CHARGES FOR QUARTER ENDED MARCH 31, 2018
* AMENDMENT INCLUDES IN QTR ENDED MARCH 31, UP TO $20 MLN OF ANTICIPATED RECEIPTS THAT WILL BE RECORDED AFTER MARCH 31, 2018 - SEC FILING Source text: [ bit.ly/2vb6yoy ] Further company coverage:
